TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 8<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Today the evil council hath assembled, and against Thee hath meditated empty things. Today by a covenant doth Judas pledge himself to hanging, and Caiaphas unwillingly confesseth that one shall willingly receive death for all. O Christ God our Redeemer, glory to Thee.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: The Lord bless thee out of Sion,
He that made heaven and the earth.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Behold now, bless ye the Lord, all ye servants of the Lord.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Ye that fear the Lord, bless ye the Lord.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Praise ye the name of the Lord; O ye servants, praise the Lord.
